byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED and EVELYN M. RUSLI

abstract: As it prepared to pitch potential investors during its roadshow, Groupon nearly broke even in its third quarter and said it expected the company to be valued at as much as $11.4 billion.
snippet: As it prepared to pitch potential investors during its roadshow, Groupon nearly broke even in its third quarter and said it expected the company to be valued at as much as $11.4 billion.

headline.main: Groupon Narrows Losses Ahead of Its Pitch to Investors
headline.print_headline: Ahead of a Pitch to Investors, Groupon Cites Improvements
